amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to improve the competitiveness of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 624 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 624 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2015) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to improve the competitiveness of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 624 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 624 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Alexander.
